mapper.select: SELECT room.roomId, room.hostId, room.roomPrice, room.roomname, room.roomaddress1, room.roomloc, room.roominfo, room.roomintro, room.roomclean, room.roompet, room.roomwprice, room.roomcap, room.roomtype, room.roomlat, room.roomlng, room.roomimage1, room.roomimage2, room.roomimage3, room.roomimage4, room.roomimage5, room.roomimage6, room.roomlikes, host.hostImage, host.hostName FROM room JOIN host ON room.hostId = host.hostId

SELECT room.roomId, room.hostId, room.roomPrice, room.roomname, room.roomaddress1, room.roomloc, room.roominfo, room.roomintro, room.roomclean, room.roompet, room.roomwprice, room.roomcap, room.roomtype, room.roomlat, room.roomlng, room.roomimage1, room.roomimage2, room.roomimage3, room.roomimage4, room.roomimage5, room.roomimage6, room.roomlikes, host.hostImage, host.hostName FROM room JOIN host ON room.hostId = host.hostId

SELECT r.roomId, r.hostId, r.roomPrice, r.roomname, r.roomaddress1, r.roomloc, r.roominfo, r.roomintro, r.roomclean, r.roompet, r.roomwprice, r.roomcap, r.roomtype, r.roomlat, r.roomlng, r.roomimage1, r.roomimage2, r.roomimage3, r.roomimage4, r.roomimage5, r.roomimage6, r.roomlikes, h.hostImage, h.hostName, l.guestId ,l.likeId FROM room r JOIN host h ON r.hostId = h.hostId LEFT JOIN likeList l ON r.roomId = l.roomId AND l.guestId = #{guestId}

SELECT room.roomId, room.hostId, room.roomPrice, room.roomname, room.roomaddress1, room.roomloc, room.roominfo, room.roomintro, room.roomclean, room.roompet, room.roomwprice, room.roomcap, room.roomtype, room.roomlat, room.roomlng, room.roomimage1, room.roomimage2, room.roomimage3, room.roomimage4, room.roomimage5, room.roomimage6, room.roomlikes, host.hostImage, host.hostName, host.hostIntro FROM room JOIN host ON room.hostId = host.hostId WHERE roomId=#{roomId}

SELECT room.roomId, room.hostId, room.roomPrice, room.roomname, room.roomaddress1, room.roomloc, room.roominfo, room.roomintro, room.roomclean, room.roompet, room.roomwprice, room.roomcap, room.roomtype, room.roomlat, room.roomlng, room.roomimage1, room.roomimage2, room.roomimage3, room.roomimage4, room.roomimage5, room.roomimage6, room.roomlikes, host.hostImage, host.hostName, host.hostIntro FROM room JOIN host ON room.hostId = host.hostId
roomName LIKE '%'||#{roomName}||'%'
AND roomLoc LIKE '%'||#{roomLoc}||'%'
AND roomType LIKE '%'||#{roomType}||'%'
AND roomPrice >= #{roomPrice}

SELECT room.roomId, room.hostId, room.roomPrice, room.roomname, room.roomaddress1, room.roomloc, room.roominfo, room.roomintro, room.roomclean, room.roompet, room.roomwprice, room.roomcap, room.roomtype, room.roomlat, room.roomlng, room.roomimage1, room.roomimage2, room.roomimage3, room.roomimage4, room.roomimage5, room.roomimage6, room.roomlikes, host.hostImage, host.hostName, host.hostIntro FROM room JOIN host ON room.hostId = host.hostId WHERE room.roomLoc=#{roomLoc}
